song.title: WE DON'T CARE
song.info:
Оriginal Russian name of this song: 'NAM VSE PO-BARABANU' / "Нам всё по барабану" (To Us All Things Are On The Drum).
From "Abyss of Ice" musicdisk by Scene'99.
The original song is called "Champion", which is performed by VIA "Pesnyary" (a popular Soviet Belarusian folk-rock group) and a children's choir. It comes from "Strutting croaker" - the Soviet musical cartoon about the boastful frog, released by BelarusFilm in 1975.
